name: UpdateIncidentType
description:
Update or categorize an incident type on PagerDuty.

Use this tool to update or categorize an incident type on PagerDuty, such as security or major incidents. Requires appropriate OAuth scope for modification.

parameters.name: incident_type_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the incident type to be updated. Specify to categorize the incident.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Incident Type.

parameters.name: accept_header
parameters.description: The versioning information needed for the API, specified in the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the entity-body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: incident_type_details
parameters.description: Details of the incident type to be updated, including display name, enabled status, and description.

display_name.description: The display name of the Incident Type.

enabled.description: Whether the Incident Type is enabled. Defaults to true if not provided.

description.description: The description of the Incident Type.

incident_type.description: Details of the incident type to be created.
